data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Johann Hamel signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Monaco's half.
In Fontvieille, Saint-Etienne push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
Free kick for Monaco in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Saint-Etienne are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 5, Johann Hamel waits before resuming play because Kevin Monnet-Paquet for Saint-Etienne is still down.
Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
In the minute 7, Saint-Etienneâ€™s Kevin Monnet-Paquet is on his feet again at Stade Louis II.
Saint-Etienne drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Sofiane Diop puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 7, Wissam Ben Yedder with an assist there.
Johann Hamel awards the home team a throw-in.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Monaco.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
Saint-Etienne attack but Kevin Monnet-Paquet's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Monaco goal kick.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 14, Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
Monaco have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Throw-in Monaco.
Johann Hamel signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Monaco's half.
Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 18, Johann Hamel awards the home team a throw-in.
Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monaco's half?
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne close to the penalty box.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
Mathieu Debuchy equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
In the minute 21, Adil Aouchiche instrumental with a fine assist.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Fontvieille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 24, Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Monaco.
Johann Hamel signals a throw-in for Saint-Etienne, close to Monaco's area.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 28, Can Saint-Etienne capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Monaco's half?
Guillermo Maripan for Monaco has been booked by Johann Hamel and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! Denis Bouanga gives Saint-Etienne a 1-2 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 30, It's a goal kick for the away team in Fontvieille.
Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 33, The match at Stade Louis II has been interrupted briefly for a check on Denis Bouanga, who is down injured.
Denis Bouanga is back on his feet again.
Monaco are down to 10 men after Eliot Matazo has been shown a red card.
In the minute 36, Throw-in Monaco.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 38, Johann Hamel signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Monaco's half.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Monaco.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 40, Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
At Stade Louis II, Ruben Aguilar has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
Johann Hamel awards Monaco a goal kick.
In the minute 44, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Monaco.
Saint-Etienne's Lucas Gourna Douath has been booked in Fontvieille.
In the minute 45, Axel Disasi of Monaco smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Monaco to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
Johann Hamel will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Saint-Etienne.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Monaco.
Johann Hamel signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Monaco's half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Fontvieille.
Johann Hamel has blown to start the second-half.
Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
The home team replace Sofiane Diop with Florentino Luis.
In the minute 46, Saint-Etienne make their first substitution with Ryad Boudebouz replacing Lucas Gourna Douath.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 48, Kevin Volland is on target to level the scores at 2-2.
Great play from Gelson Martins to set up the goal.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
Johann Hamel awards the home team a throw-in.
Monaco needs to be cautious. Saint-Etienne have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 53, Throw-in Monaco.
In Fontvieille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 56, Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monaco's half?
Johann Hamel signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Monaco's half.
In the minute 58, Romain Hamouma is replacing Adil Aouchiche for Saint-Etienne at Stade Louis II.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
Saint-Etienne push forward at Stade Louis II and Kolo gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Monaco defence.
In the minute 59, Saint-Etienne's Denis Bouanga gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
Djibril Sidibe is on a sub for Caio Henrique for Monaco.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne at Stade Louis II.
Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 62, It's a goal kick for the home team in Fontvieille.
Throw-in Monaco.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 64, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Monaco in the half of Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 67, Throw-in high up the field for Saint-Etienne in Fontvieille.
Johann Hamel awards the home team a throw-in.
Denis Bouanga for Saint-Etienne gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 69, Johann Hamel awards Monaco a goal kick.
Niko Kovac (Monaco) is making a third substitution, with Pietro Pellegri replacing Wissam Ben Yedder.
Claude Puel is making the team's third substitution at Stade Louis II with Jean-Philippe Krasso replacing Denis Bouanga.
Free kick Monaco.
In the minute 70, Arnaud Nordin is replacing Kevin Monnet-Paquet for the away team.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 71, Kevin Volland is booked for the home team.
Arnaud Nordin (Saint-Etienne) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Monaco have a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
Goal kick for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 77, Ball goes out of play for a Monaco goal kick.
Saint-Etienne have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne close to the penalty box.
In the minute 80, Saint-Etienne pushes forward through Arnaud Nordin, whose finish on goal is saved.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Monaco.
Mahdi Camara (Saint-Etienne) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
Johann Hamel signals a throw-in for Saint-Etienne, close to Monaco's area.
Romain Hamouma gets his shot on target but fails to score for Saint-Etienne.
Fode Toure is on a sub for Kevin Volland for Monaco.
In the minute 84, Monaco make their fifth substitution with Willem Geubbels replacing Gelson Martins.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
In the minute 85, Saint-Etienne push upfield and Mathieu Debuchy gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Monaco defence.
Goal kick for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
Saint-Etienne are coming forward and Mahdi Camara gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 87, Ball goes out of play for a Monaco goal kick.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 89, Monaco to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne at Stade Louis II.
2 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
